about_the_game:
Try yourself as a grumpy grandpa who was sent to the store for bread.

Try on the role of a grumpy grandpa who was sent to the store for bread.

Have a race playing as a grandpa! Throughout the entire journey, you will be constantly hampered by geese, electric scooters and your own health, which you need to monitor so that the race does not end too soon!

But grandpa also has a couple of aces up his sleeve:

• Thanks to the special pills that he takes, obstacles in grandpa's path disappear and then reappear.
• Having collected enough coins, grandpa will be able to buy himself an energy drink and super boots, which will increase his endurance, and even improve his physical characteristics!
• Vending machines are located here and there on the streets, where you can buy useful things.
• Advertising posters with memes to boost morale
• Grandpa appreciates street benches and can have a good rest on them

Yes, in our runner you can stop in the middle of the run to catch your breath, sit on a bench and even ride a few stops on the bus.

Help Grandpa uncover the secrets of his past and come face to face with his greatest fear!

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 2.10 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Who said that old age is no fun? Grandpa: Bread Adventure is a crazy reimagining of the runner genre. Run around the city, overcoming obstacles, dodging hated scooter riders and geese.
